alert.note: Alert for Coosa; Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 1:03AM CDT until March 26 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ELMORE...WEST CENTRAL TALLAPOOSA AND SOUTHEASTERN COOSA COUNTIES... At 103 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Equality, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Equality, Jacksons` Gap, Eastern Lake Martin, Western Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Kowaliga Bridge, Wind Creek State Park, Southern Lake Martin, Fishpond, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area and Dare Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
